## Subscription.unsubscribe() method

If called without arg, removes this subscription from parent (if any), cleans up internal state and goes into DONE state. If called with arg, removes the sub from internal pool and if no other subs are remaining also cleans up itself and goes into DONE state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unsubscribe(sub?: Subscription<B, any>): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sub | <code>Subscription&lt;B, any&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`
